name: Hot Wingbatz
description:
Screencaps are NTSC (top, squarer display, clock speed 60Hz); PAL (bottom, rectanglier display, clock speed 50Hz). Another classic re-issued, optimal new flavor, delicious Kraksnax intropic.

They are here. The heat is on. The wingbatz have the earthchild dingbatz cornered. They are everywhere.
